title: Delicate Diamond Mangalsutra Pendant in Rose Gold - A Modern Take on Tradition
materials: Round brilliant cut Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones with High Clarity. The black beads are of high-quality glass. The pendant is crafted with a durable base metal and features meticulous prong setting.
features: This mangalsutra features a dainty rose gold chain interspersed with traditional black beads, culminating in a modern, circular pendant adorned with sparkling cubic zirconia. The design balances traditional symbolism with contemporary aesthetics, making it perfect for daily wear. The central CZ stone is emphasized by a halo setting for amplified brilliance.
occasions: or as a thoughtful gift for a newly married woman.
description: This mangalsutra is a beautiful blend of tradition and modern style. The delicate rose gold chain and sparkling CZ pendant make it a versatile piece that can be worn every day. The high-quality materials and craftsmanship ensure lasting durability. Its subtle elegance makes it a timeless addition to any jewelry collection. Lightweight and comfortable for all-day wear.
